price: নিশ্চয় যিয়ে ভয় কৰে তাৰ বাবে ইয়াত শিক্ষা আছে।
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّمَن يَخۡشَىٰٓ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan liman yakhshā
